scripts.build:vm: ./bundle.sh && scripts/check_perms.sh && scripts/setup_deps.sh && scripts/prep_kettle.sh && scripts/env_wrapper.sh mkosi --profile=gcp -I tdx-dummy.conf
scripts.build:vm:clean: ./bundle.sh && scripts/check_perms.sh && scripts/setup_deps.sh && scripts/prep_kettle.sh && scripts/env_wrapper.sh mkosi --force --profile=gcp -I tdx-dummy.conf
